description: This file defines an asynchronous script that creates two agent instances (regular and reasoning) using the OpenAIChat model, and runs a task to count the number of 'r's in the word 'strawberry' by invoking their response methods, with console output for progress indication.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with an AI model, capable of generating responses and reasoning.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous main function that runs the console rules and invokes the agents to respond to the task.
